info.name: Billy AI Marketing API
info.description: Complete API collection for LinkedIn Product Launch detection and email outreach automation. Includes authentication, company management, profile management, job tracking, and all API endpoints.

request.description: Register a new user and create a tenant workspace. First user becomes admin. Returns access_token and refresh_token.
Authenticate user and get JWT tokens. Returns access_token and refresh_token.
Get a new access token using refresh token. Use when access token expires (24h).
Get information about the currently authenticated user.
Add a LinkedIn company to track for your tenant. Requires valid LinkedIn company URL format.
List all companies for your tenant with pagination. Optional filter by is_active status.
List only active companies for your tenant.
List only inactive (soft-deleted) companies for your tenant.
Update company fields (name, linkedin_url, is_active). Can update one or more fields. Must own the company.
Hard delete a company (permanently removes from database). Company data is permanently deleted. Must own the company. Cannot delete if company has posts or is linked to campaigns.

query.description: Maximum number of posts to scrape (1-1000, default: 100)

request.description: Trigger LinkedIn post scraping for a company using Apify. Returns job_id immediately (async task). Scraped posts are saved to the database. Must own the company.
Trigger LinkedIn post scraping with max_posts in request body instead of query parameter.

formdata.description: CSV file with company data. Columns: name, linkedin_url

request.description: Upload multiple companies via CSV file. CSV should have columns: name, linkedin_url. Maximum 1000 companies per upload.
Add a single LinkedIn profile URL manually. URL is validated and normalized. Returns profile_id.

query.description: Filter by status: url_only, scraped, scraping_failed
Filter by company name (partial match, case-insensitive)
Search in person_name, headline, company (case-insensitive, partial match)
Sort field: created_at, person_name, scraped_at (default: created_at)

request.description: List all profiles for your tenant with filtering, search, pagination, and sorting. Returns profiles array, pagination metadata, and stats (total, scraped, pending, failed).
List only scraped profiles.
Search profiles by name, headline, or company.
Example of combined filters: status, company, location with pagination and sorting.

formdata.description: CSV file with LinkedIn profile URLs. First column should be linkedin_url. Optional columns: name, notes.

request.description: Upload multiple LinkedIn profile URLs via CSV file. Maximum 1000 profiles per upload. CSV can have header row with 'linkedin_url' and optional 'name' column, or just URLs in first column.
Download CSV template for bulk profile uploads. Template includes example row with linkedin_url, name, and notes columns.
Scrape all profiles with status='url_only' for your tenant. Returns job_id immediately (async task). Processes up to 50 profiles per job. Use job_id to check status via GET /api/jobs/{job_id}.
Scrape a single profile by ID. Returns job_id immediately (async task). Use job_id to check status via GET /api/jobs/{job_id}.
Get a single profile by ID with full details. Returns complete profile information including experiences, skills, educations, and all profile fields. Must own the profile (same tenant).

Bulk delete multiple profiles. Request body: {"ids": ["uuid1", "uuid2", ...]}. Maximum 100 profiles per request. Returns 200 if all succeed, 207 (Multi-Status) if partial success, 400 if all fail. Validation: All IDs must belong to tenant, cannot delete profiles linked to campaigns, cannot delete profiles with sent emails. Response includes deleted_count and results with successful/failed arrays.

Delete a profile by ID. Requirements: Profile must exist and belong to the requesting tenant. Profile must not be linked to any active campaigns. Email records will have their profile_id set to NULL if possible. Returns 200 on success, 400 if profile is linked to active campaigns, 403 if profile belongs to different tenant, 404 if profile not found.

Get the status of an async job (e.g., profile scraping, post scraping). Returns job details including status (pending, processing, completed, failed), progress, results, and error messages if any. Must own the job (same tenant).
List all email templates (default templates + your custom templates). Returns templates with detected variables.
Get a single template by ID. Default templates are visible to all tenants. Custom templates only visible to owner.
Create a custom email template for your tenant. Supported variables: {{recipient_name}}, {{company_name}}, {{product_name}}, {{sender_name}}, {{post_summary}}
Update a custom template (name, subject, body). Cannot update default templates. Only owner can update.
Delete a custom template. Cannot delete default templates. Only owner can delete.

body.raw:
{
  "recipient_name": "John Doe",
  "company_name": "Acme Corp",
  "product_name": "New Product",
  "sender_name": "Jane Smith",
  "post_summary": "Exciting new launch!"
}

request.description: Preview a template with sample data. Replaces all placeholders with provided values. Returns rendered subject and body.
List all campaigns for your tenant with pagination.
Get a single campaign by ID with profile details.
Create a new campaign linking a post with profiles. Requires valid post_id and at least one profile_id. Status: draft, active, or completed.
Add profiles to an existing campaign. Requires campaign_id and array of profile_ids. Returns updated campaign with all profiles.
Remove a profile from a campaign. Only removes the link, does not delete the profile.
Generate emails for all profiles in a campaign using a template. Returns job_id immediately (async task). Emails are generated using Claude AI based on post content and profile information.
Send all draft emails in a campaign via AWS SES (async). Returns job_id immediately. Only emails with status='draft' are sent.
Delete a campaign. Only owner can delete.

query.description: Filter by status: draft, sent, failed
Search in subject and recipient name

request.description: List all emails for your tenant with filtering, pagination, and search. Only non-deleted emails are returned.
Generate a single personalized email using Claude AI. Requires post_id, profile_id, and template_id. Email is generated based on post content and profile information, then saved with status='draft'.
Get single email details with related data (post, profile, company). Returns full email information including subject, body, status, and metadata.
Update email (subject, body, status). Cannot update if status='sent'. All fields are optional. Status must be one of: draft, sent, failed.
Soft delete email (sets deleted_at timestamp). Cannot delete if status='sent'. Deleted emails are not returned in list endpoints.

Send a single email via AWS SES (async). Returns job_id immediately. Email must have status='draft' and recipient must have a valid email address. Email status is updated to 'sent' after successful delivery.

formdata.description: CSV file with lead/email data. Columns: linkedin_url (required), email (required), name (optional), notes (optional)

request.description: Upload multiple leads/emails via CSV file. CSV should have columns: linkedin_url (required), email (required), name (optional), notes (optional). Maximum 1000 leads per upload. Creates or updates profiles with email addresses. Use ?force_update=true to overwrite existing emails.

query.description: Filter posts from this date (YYYY-MM-DD, optional)
Filter posts until this date (YYYY-MM-DD, optional)

request.description: List scraped LinkedIn posts with filtering, pagination, and sorting. Returns posts sorted by date (newest first). Includes company name from JOIN with companies table. Multi-tenant: only returns posts from user's tenant.

Get a single post by ID with full details. Returns complete post information including post_text, post_date, score, ai_judgement, source_url, company information, and metadata. Must own the post (same tenant).
Analyze a single post using Claude AI. Returns job_id immediately (async task). Use job_id to check status via GET /api/jobs/{job_id}.
Analyze multiple posts in batch. Maximum 100 posts per batch. Returns job_ids for tracking.

Bulk delete multiple posts. Request body: {"ids": ["uuid1", "uuid2", ...]}. Maximum 100 posts per request. Returns 200 if all succeed, 207 (Multi-Status) if partial success, 400 if all fail. Validation: All IDs must belong to tenant, cannot delete posts linked to campaigns, cannot delete posts with sent emails. Response includes deleted_count and results with successful/failed arrays.

Delete a post by ID. Requirements: Post must exist and belong to the requesting tenant. Post must not be linked to any campaigns. Post must not have any sent emails (status='sent'). Draft emails will be deleted via CASCADE. Returns 200 on success, 400 if post is linked to campaigns or has sent emails, 403 if post belongs to different tenant, 404 if post not found.
Check if the API server is running and healthy.
